mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, x.* FROM ( SELECT a.* FROM joa_owncou a where a.own_member_id = #{sid} and a.own_use_date is not null ORDER BY a.own_use_date DESC ) x where ROWNUM<=3
select count(*) from joa_owncou where own_member_id=#{sid} and own_use_date is null
select * from joa_owncou where own_member_id=#{sid} and own_use_date is null
mapper.delete: delete from joa_payMovie where payMov_mem_id=#{sid} and payMov_the_idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select * from joa_owncou where own_member_id=#{sid} and own_use_date is not null
select * from joa_helpquestion where hqt_id=#{sid} order by hqt_idx desc
select * from joa_applycant inner join joa_event on joa_applycant.app_event_subject = joa_event.eve_subject where app_member_id =#{sid}
select * from joa_applycant inner join joa_event on joa_applycant.app_event_subject = joa_event.eve_subject where sysdate > eve_start_date
select * from joa_product_result inner join joa_payProduct on joa_product_result.prs_date = joa_payProduct.payPro_date where prs_order_idx=#{sid}
mapper.update: update joa_member set mem_name =#{mem_name}, mem_tel=#{mem_tel}, mem_email=#{mem_email}, mem_pwd=#{mem_pwd} where mem_id=#{sid}
